codes.msg: Access to the file or directory was denied
The specified file or directory was not found
The file or directory already exists
The specified ID is invalid
There is not enough space to complete the operation
Failed to create the file
The specified path is too long
The specified path format is invalid
The specified directory name or file name is invalid
The specified file type is invalid
Failed to resolve to an absolute path
The specified root path is invalid
The specified path is invalid
The source path is invalid (move/copy)
The destination path is invalid (move/copy)
The specified path is not a file
The file is already open and cannot be accessed
The file is not open and cannot be accessed
The file exceeds the maximum allowed size
The file stream is read-only and cannot be modified
The file stream is write-only and cannot be read
The operation would cause a buffer overflow
The specified path is not a directory
The directory is already mounted
The directory is not mounted
The directory or file is already being monitored
The directory or file is not being monitored
No data was found in the file or directory
The deserialized data size does not match the expected type size
The deserialized data type does not match the expected type
The operation is not supported
The filesystem interface is null or not initialized
